Name: maximize_team_availability
Description: Maximize the overall availability of all team members

Name: minimize_project_budget
Description: Minimize the total budget spent across all projects

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the average priority of features developed

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the severity of active blockers

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status of sprint goals

Name: maximize_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of teams

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort of tasks in the sprint backlog

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the satisfaction level of stakeholders (inferred from review feedback)

Name: minimize_sprint_duration
Description: Minimize the duration of sprints (end_date - start_date)
